mapper.insert: insert into `order`(orderDate, userId, title, cCount, imageCode,bookId, totalPrice) values(#{orderDate},#{userId},#{title},#{cCount},#{imageCode},#{bookId},#{totalPrice})
mapper.select: select orderId, orderDate, userId, title, cCount, imageCode,bookId, totalPrice from `order` where userId = #{userId} order by orderDate DESC
